reportColumns.columnDescription: This Client ID will be automatically populated everytime the process runs with a new GUID information or it can be hardcoded to any value the dev team wants it to be since it will not affect TRIMS consumption process

This Client Transaction Reference Number itï¿½s a refernce number which can later be use to refer a transaction in TRIMS.This value will be equal to the Check Number being created in this process which is automatically assign
This Transaction Type value will be equal to CHECK
This Debit Account Number value will be equal to 826195385
This Debit Routing Number value will be equal to 111300880
This Amount value will be equal to the SUM amount of all the Payment Stubs remit amounts
This Check Date value will be equal to the date for which the file is created
This Check Number value will be unique & automatically inputed by the system starting from last check number use + 1.Check Number must be unique for the bank & be a max of 10 digits numeric
This Delivery Method value = '0000'
This Form Code value = 'A2'
This Payee Name value will either consist of the name of our customer OR the name of the service provider
This field will contain the SUM Amount of any Interests accrued (take into consideration any reversals) since the loan originated
This Payee Town value will either consist of the mailing city of our customer OR the mailing city of the service provider
This Payee State value will either consist of the mailing state of our customer OR the mailing state of the service provider
This Payee Zip value will either consist of the mailing zip of our customer OR the mailing zip of the service provider
If the payment is to a customer (Tran = 44, P00) than this value will be NULL.If the payment is to a Vendor (41/45/90's/Corp Adv.) than the loan number will be display in this field
This Document Date value will consist of the date in which the payment(s)/invoice(s) was posted
This Number value will consist of the Invoice Number coming from our system of records
If the payment is to a customer (Tran = 44, P00) than this value will be NULL.If the payment is to a Vendor (41/45/90's/Corp Adv.) than the loan number will be display in this field
This Remit Amount value will consist of the amount of the payment(s)/invoice(s) posted
This Remit Pay Type will consists of transaction codes of the transactions posted
